job.title: Sr Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAre valued and empowered collaborative and team oriented innovative in their approach and passionate about their work They are reliable trustworthy and open with a high level of integrity We value diversity are inclusive and are committed to a global approachltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPosition SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAre you looking to be an integral part of a team delivering highquality features for exciting nextgeneration products Do you want to contribute to the cuttingedge technology and products we are known for worldwide The System Performance and Solution Group is looking for an experienced Software Engineer with a software testing background to join usltbrgtltbrgtOn our team you will be responsible for the design and execution of solution and systemlevel software test plans for BIGIP products This includes automating test cases and contributing to test tools and infrastructure You will also be responsible for documenting test results and validating product defectsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPrimary ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtUnderstand product design and functionality through handson experienceltligtltligtPerform manual exploratory testing and troubleshooting to help identify difficult to find bugsltligtltligtDevelop highquality endtoend automation tests that match user scenariosltligtltligtImprove and build automation infrastructureltligtltligtProactively and openly communicate status planofaction and resolution of issuesltligtltligtWork effectively to deliver on planned and committed schedules through holistic ownership over assigned product areas and projectsltligtltligtOpenly engage on challenges with a growth mindsetltligtltligtPerform analysis to define design requirements for modification to existing tools utilities system structures environments and provide technical perspective for input into project scope and estimating activitiesltligtltligtProvide technical mentorship to junior level engineersltligtltligtAssist with and drive customer solutionsltligtltligtParticipates in hiring and onboarding processltligtltulgtltstronggtltstronggtKnowledge Skills and AbilitiesltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligtPython or Golang programming skillsltligtltligtA very good grasp of automation test methodologies and frameworksltligtltligtExperience with networking and traffic generation toolsltligtltligtMust have a strong background in networking technologies ampamp protocols like IP TCP UDP DNS HTTP etcltligtltligtSolid experience with Linux operating systemsltligtltligtExperience with Kubernetes Dockers NFV SDN controllers OpenDaylight and OpenStack is a plusltligtltligtExperience with GitLabGitHub or other source code management systemsltligtltligtStrong analytical and troubleshooting skillsltligtltulgtltstronggtltstronggtQualifications ltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligtTypically requires a minimum of 8 years of related experience with a Bachelors degree or 6 years and a Masters degree or a PhD with 3 years of experience or
